rocks.bastion.core.event

Interface BastionListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BastionRunner, DefaultBastionFactory

    public interface BastionListener
    Interface that BastionBuilderImpl will use to notify implementors of call status.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void callError(BastionErrorEvent event)
      Event fired when an error (that is not an assertion error) on a call occurs.
      void callFailed(BastionFailureEvent event)
      Event fired when assertions on call failed.
      void callFinished(BastionFinishedEvent event)
      Event fired when a call completed successfully.
      void callStarted(BastionStartedEvent event)
      Event fired when a call has started.

    • Method Detail

      • callStarted

        void callStarted(BastionStartedEvent event)
        Event fired when a call has started.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object containing information about the Bastion request which was started

      • callFinished

        void callFinished(BastionFinishedEvent event)
        Event fired when a call completed successfully.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object containing information about the Bastion request which was completed

      • callFailed

        void callFailed(BastionFailureEvent event)
        Event fired when assertions on call failed.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object containing information about the Bastion request which has failed assertions

      • callError

        void callError(BastionErrorEvent event)
        Event fired when an error (that is not an assertion error) on a call occurs.
        Parameters:
        event - Event object containing information about the Bastion request which could not be completed successfully
